response.overview: Together (2025) is not your usual love story. It begins with Tim and Millie, a couple who escape to the countryside to find peace and romance. Their plan is simple: spend time away from the busy city and focus on each other. At first, everything feels perfect, almost like a dream. But dreams can quickly turn into nightmares.  Strange incidents start happening around them. Shadows in the night, unsettling silence, and secrets they didn’t expect to face begin to unravel. What was supposed to be a romantic getaway soon becomes a test of their trust, loyalty, and strength. The bond between Tim and Millie is pushed to its limits, and both must decide if love alone is strong enough to survive fear.
response.tagline: When love meets fear, only trust can keep them together.
response.title: Together (2025) – Love Tested by Fear
